oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jane E. Penn sampler
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sampler made by Jane E. Penn. The sampler includes Penn's date of birth, October 14, 1816, and an image of the school she attended. Also stitched on the sampler is the verse: "Religion should our thoughts engage, amidst our youthful bloom, it will fit us for declining age and for the awful tomb."
